title: Champion Select
body: During Champ select the game is disconnecting randomly for others and myself. People are leaving the lobby yet champ select is still going on. I just got leaver penalty for dodging in ranked select when it said everyone else left the lobby and i was frozen. Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client could be falling out of sync with champion select. This could be caused by some local network settings or possibly some problems along your route to the server. As a first step, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it commonly resolves most connection problems.

Let me know if this issue persists through those changes.
